review_blob: Its hoppy like the name says. Beautiful appearance and thick tast. 60 IBU, barely too strong to take a big gulp. But definitely one of my favorites thus far.

Although I am quite new to drinking brews and having the desire to learn and try new brews, this is one of my favorites.
The bottle top is so true "Hated by many, loved by few." Not many can handle the high IBU, id guess around 80-83. 
But for me the aroma gives off the hint of a lager or low IBU brew. 
Great brew, loved being able to drink just one Pt! Cheers
